purpose: Comprehensive type definitions for Firestore query operations and real-time snapshot subscription flows. These types provide type safety for Firebase Firestore queries, snapshot listeners, and Redis-backed cache synchronization. Used extensively by Firebase helpers and snapshot management systems.
dependencies: TObject - Generic object type from akeyless-types-commons
FirebaseFirestore.WhereFilterOp - Firebase Firestore where filter operators

type_definitions.name: QueryDocuments
type_definitions.description: Type definition for querying multiple documents from a Firestore collection with a single where condition.

type_definitions.name: QueryDocument
type_definitions.definition:
type QueryDocument = (
    collection_path: string,
    field_name: string,
    operator: FirebaseFirestore.WhereFilterOp,
    value: any,
    ignore_log?: boolean
) => Promise<TObject<any>>;
type_definitions.description: Type definition for querying a single document (throws error if not found).

type_definitions.name: QueryDocumentOptional
type_definitions.definition:
type QueryDocumentOptional = (
    collection_path: string,
    field_name: string,
    operator: FirebaseFirestore.WhereFilterOp,
    value: any,
    ignore_log?: boolean
) => Promise<TObject<any> | null>;
type_definitions.description: Type definition for querying a single document that may not exist (returns null if not found).

type_definitions.name: WhereCondition
type_definitions.description: Interface defining a single Firestore where condition for queries.

type_definitions.name: OnSnapshotConfig
type_definitions.description: Combined type that includes both parser callbacks and extra configuration.

type_definitions.name: Snapshot
type_definitions.description: Type definition for creating a single snapshot subscription.

type_definitions.name: InitSnapshotsOptions
type_definitions.description: Interface for snapshot initialization options used during server startup.

context: Firebase Helpers - All Firestore query functions use these types
Snapshot System - Real-time data synchronization uses snapshot types
Redis Integration - Redis-backed snapshots use the same type system
Cache Management - Snapshot data is stored in cache_manager using these types
Server Bootstrap - Initial snapshot loading uses InitSnapshotsOptions
